descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Karl-Anthony Towns fakes out the Nuggets' defense and tosses a perfect pass to Jarred Vanderbilt for the slam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (KAT displays his elite PG skills with a fake and no-look dime to Vanderbilt) 2021/5/13 ESHEET

videos.headline: KAT displays his elite PG skills with a fake and no-look dime to Vanderbilt

videos.description: Paul Millsap shows off his vision with a perfect pass to JaMychal Green in transition for the jam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Millsap lasers top-notch dime to Green for slam) 2021/5/23 ESHEET

videos.headline: Millsap lasers top-notch dime to Green for slam

videos.description: Anthony Edwards shows no mercy on the rim with a giant slam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Anthony Edwards takes flight for electrifying throwdown) 2021/5/13 ESHEET

videos.headline: Anthony Edwards takes flight for electrifying throwdown

videos.description: Nikola Jokic goes head-to-head with Karl-Anthony Towns and hits a step-back shot on him, plus the foul. (edited)

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Jokic hits falling and-1 over KAT) 2021/5/13 ESHEET

videos.headline: Jokic hits falling and-1 over KAT
